title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
created_time: September 24, 2023, 07:52:39 AMLast edit: September 24, 2023, 08:28:58 AM by Fivestar4everMVP
content: Hi my fellow brothers and sisters from another mother, I just think am say, e go good or make sense make we get a thread that will be dedicated to we posting whatever we are celebrating in our individual life or family..Which includes, but not limited to....BirthdaysEngagementsIntroductionsWeddings(Traditional/White)Marriage anniversariesNew Born BabyNew Dream JobNew CarNew HouseChild DedicationWin Lottery or JackpotSuccessfully Japa 😁ETC.We are family here, what ever you want us to celebrate with you, please post it here. Why I Think this Thread is Important For our Local board..         Something worthy of celebrating happened to/in my family, which I thought I should post about here so that ya all, a family I spend some of my time with, can join me in the celebration and thanking God(Christians) Allah(Muslims), I con reason am say when I create a thread about this good news, alot of my fellow brothers and sisters who have one thing or the other to celebrate will be encouraged to post about that too, by creating a new thread again, and before we know it, this entire board will be littered with threads of fellow brothers and sisters celebrating one thing or the other, and this not good for our new and growing board..So I con think am say, e go good make we get all of our good events, worthy of celebration posts in one place, and also the congratulations in one place as well..Now, Na Just Two Rules I want Make We Adhere To.. 1. Create a Heading of what you are celebrating, make it bolded and underlined - Example - I BOUGHT A NEW CAR - WOW😍Then beneath, tell your story.. You can also edit the main Subject of this thread to match with what ever you are celebrating..for example FROM..TORESULT2. No Merit Phishing - Now, I understand say many of us dey like abuse opportunities for our own profiting, i beg or abeg, nobody should come here telling us lies for the sole purpose of earning merits, and on this note - Not just me, but the entire community reserve the right to ask any user for proof of that which they posts about celebrating, this is if it sounds too bogus and unbelievable. - and in a situation the user is not able to provide any form of proof, (which does not require you reveal any of your private information), then that post wil be deleted based on opinion from the community, and such user will be Negatively tagged for lying.Don't say a negative tag for lying is too harsh, rule is rule, to avoid being tagged, obey it..Thank you guys,Let the celebrations begin 🎉🎉🎉🎉

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: A NEW BABY IS BORN INTO MY FAMILY, JOIN ME IN THE CELEBRATION.So yesterday was a really big day for me and my father, if some of you guys noticed, I wasn't really active on the forum yesterday, it was for the fact that I was in the hospital as early as 1am Saturday morning, the devil showed up, did all he could to see that I morn rather than celebrate, but God showed up and gave me victory at the end, so I am here today thanking God, and calling on you guys to join me in thanking God and also in the celebration..My wife went through c-session to deliver off this child, I am happy for she came out alive and our baby alive, aside from the c-session pain my wife is still going through, both of them are strong 💪, I am so happy.And again, my other happiness is for the fact that - I don hang boot 😂😂, the way our dear country is going, does not require one having too many children, only born as many you know you fit give proper training..I have three beautiful daughters already and that is enough for me, my wife said to me, "but we are yet to have a boy", and I said to her, "boy or no boy "I am don having children".I will make sure this ones get the best of parental training, get the best of education, get the best of everything I can afford to give them a really good life.Join me celebrate guys, I am so so happy 😊 😁😁💃💃💃💃.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on September 24, 2023, 07:55:12 AM My colleague,  I dey on a mad Cruz since that time you inform me of your wife delivery and I like the fact say you be a strong man to be able to take it all alone,  my earlier thought is that you may have PM me during that process based on our earlier discussion but thank almighty God who took control of the whole situations and congratulations as you welcome your baby Princess,  indeed if you hang boot you don win your wife or. Because daughters are for the father and the sons go to their mothers that is how God has configured the family to function,  any man that has daughters will leave long because you always have someone looking out for you even when your wife or mother may not be there for you. Knowing the fact that as a man,  life already played you 1:0 so you need all the love and care you can get.
